channel.title: Flawless Scape 498 PK & Economy
channel.description:
FlawlessScape is a 498 server based on Arios, as the developer of Arios did a really good job with the server. After spending 3 months coding Runesource from scratch, I found the Arios release. There are just really small changes as I will be updating the server when its running. We currently use the PK world of Arios. If we gain enough players for full economy world, we have enough space to host both servers. All non-combat skills are set to 1 and if you want you can skill like in an economy server. Later we will add some areas and items that require high non-combat skills. There are also reward shops for PVP, and bosses at which you can obtain similar items.
Goals: We want to create a full 498 emulation but with custom content such as instant PK, custom minigames, and more. We also want to add Ironman mode; Ironman mode will have some features disabled such as item spawning, and manual skill level adjusting. Also we want to entice players to enter the wilderness as much as possible, so things like bosses and whatnot are being added to the wilderness/wilderness areas. A website will be up soon where players can suggest new content, and it will be held to a community vote.
Server Features [code]Large starter default in the bank KDR statistic PK package 23 skills fully working (construction is unfinished) Minigames: Barrows, Bounty Hunter, Clan Wars, God Wars, Mage Training Arena, Pest Control, Puro Puro, Tzhaar Fight Caves, Tzhaar Fight Pits, Warrior Guild, Falador party room Bosses: God War Bosses, KBD, KQ, Mole, Dagannoth Kings, Bork, Chaos Elemental. Full music system All free quests 8+ Member quests Clan chat All random events[/code]
Website features(website will be up soon): [code]Managing your account (UUID verification) Highscores Voting Heatmap Forum Full Control Panel for RSPS Change password Account registration through website and server Synchronized rank with in-game rank Webshop[/code]
For the website we are using our own CMS that is developed for RSPS. In our website there is an integrated phpbb forum with login and registration system. We also implemented full Client(server) registration. We limited account creation to 3 so you can only have 3 accounts with your UUID. UUID is generated for your PC automatically. You can easily manage all your accounts through the website itself. Also forum and shoutbox have synchronized ranks from in-game and we want to create a really advanced website. We are also working on our own Webshop system where you can buy perks and credits.
[SPOILER=Media]Barrows [img]http://i59.tinypic.com/vgkc3p.png[/img] Bounty Hunter [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/2gtsn6t.png[/img] Bork [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/vio5yu.png[/img] Grand Exchange [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/wkfzfq.png[/img] kq [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/20r4w8.png[/img] Mole with lighting system [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/saw6dd.png[/img] Mage Training Arena with all chamber [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/2h3pq2f.png[/img] [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/24gj6uh.png[/img] Warrior guild [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/wthouv.png[/img] Pk package [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/2vkkx3n.png[/img] Hearmap v1 (soon will be added sector system and random boss display event) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6nHYGRs.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
Some change logs [code] Created missing API for world select Created missed mysql table Removed setskill for non combat skill Added account limit creation to 3 Fixed object handling for spawn plugin Added teleport option system Added web heatmap system New character phpbb password hash Redone sprite editor for cache Added as default modern hotkeys added toggle hotkeys for players ::togglefk or ::togglehk remove price value from spawneable item in shop and alchemy value other miscellaneous minor changes [/code]
Launcher download link: [URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/35dz064nwia28ev/Launcher.jar?dl=0"]FlawlScape Launcher[/URL]
Credits: Jagex, Arios team

item.title: Flawless Scape 498 PK & Economy
item.dc:creator: @dano741 dano741
item.description:
@dano741 wrote:

FlawlessScape is a 498 server based on Arios, as the developer of Arios did a really good job with the server. After spending 3 months coding Runesource from scratch, I found the Arios release. There are just really small changes as I will be updating the server when its running. We currently use the PK world of Arios. If we gain enough players for full economy world, we have enough space to host both servers. All non-combat skills are set to 1 and if you want you can skill like in an economy server. Later we will add some areas and items that require high non-combat skills. There are also reward shops for PVP, and bosses at which you can obtain similar items.

Goals:
We want to create a full 498 emulation but with custom content such as instant PK, custom minigames, and more. We also want to add Ironman mode; Ironman mode will have some features disabled such as item spawning, and manual skill level adjusting. Also we want to entice players to enter the wilderness as much as possible, so things like bosses and whatnot are being added to the wilderness/wilderness areas. A website will be up soon where players can suggest new content, and it will be held to a community vote.

Server Features

Large starter default in the bank KDR statistic PK package 23 skills fully working (construction is unfinished) Minigames: Barrows, Bounty Hunter, Clan Wars, God Wars, Mage Training Arena, Pest Control, Puro Puro, Tzhaar Fight Caves, Tzhaar Fight Pits, Warrior Guild, Falador party room Bosses: God War Bosses, KBD, KQ, Mole, Dagannoth Kings, Bork, Chaos Elemental. Full music system All free quests 8+ Member quests Clan chat All random events

Website features(website will be up soon):

Managing your account (UUID verification) Highscores Voting Heatmap Forum Full Control Panel for RSPS Change password Account registration through website and server Synchronized rank with in-game rank Webshop

For the website we are using our own CMS that is developed for RSPS. In our website there is an integrated phpbb forum with login and registration system. We also implemented full Client(server) registration. We limited account creation to 3 so you can only have 3 accounts with your UUID. UUID is generated for your PC automatically. You can easily manage all your accounts through the website itself. Also forum and shoutbox have synchronized ranks from in-game and we want to create a really advanced website. We are also working on our own Webshop system where you can buy perks and credits.

Some change logs

Created missing API for world select
Created missed mysql table
Removed setskill for non combat skill
Added account limit creation to 3
Fixed object handling for spawn plugin
Added teleport option system
Added web heatmap system
New character phpbb password hash
Redone sprite editor for cache
Added as default modern hotkeys
added toggle hotkeys for players ::togglefk or ::togglehk
remove price value from spawneable item in shop and alchemy value
other miscellaneous minor changes

Launcher download link: FlawlScape Launcher

Credits:
Jagex, Arios team
